newsitem.title: USA: Ascend supplies switches to Savvis Comms.
newsitem.headline: Ascend supplies switches to Savvis Comms.

text.p: Ascend Communications Inc Monday said it will supply St. Louis-based Savvis Communications with its Internet switching equipment, for an undisclosed sum.
Savvis will utilize Ascend's GRF 400 high-performance switches throughout its nationwide asynchronous transfer mode (ATM)-based backbone network, Ascend said.

Further, Savvis plans to install the high performance switch/routers in five private network access points nationwide by the end of the second quarter of 1997, with an additional 13 planned by year-end.
ATM is an emerging technology on which a new generation of higher speed networks are being built that are better able to handle voice, video and data simultaneously.
